subject: Hockey, Ice
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. fined Chicago Blackhawks forward Andrew Shaw $2,000 for taking a dive during a game on March 30 against the Los Angeles Kings.
snippet: The N.H.L. fined Chicago Blackhawks forward Andrew Shaw $2,000 for taking a dive during a game on March 30 against the Los Angeles Kings.
